definition: variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Embargoes lead to more total coverage than exclusives.
sentences.chinese: 保密協議比獨家報道的覆蓋面更加廣泛。

sentences.english: This makes it very attractive for providing wide coverage.
sentences.chinese: 這使它對提供覆蓋面廣的服務很有吸引力。

sentences.chinese: 四是資料覆蓋面廣，可利用性強。

sentences.english: If your lawn is small, the large size mulching blades are not necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的草坪小，葉片覆蓋面積大都是沒有必要的。

sentences.english: Sound social security system, to expand social security coverage.
sentences.chinese: 健全社會保障制度，擴大社保覆蓋面。

sentences.english: That’s going to require commitment from government at all levels and strong stomach and nerves.
sentences.chinese: 這就要求政府作出覆蓋面廣而強有力的承諾。

sentences.english: Fold back the cover and read comfortably with just one hand.
sentences.chinese: 反折的覆蓋面和閱讀只有一個手感舒適。

sentences.english: Managers of production-oriented organizations concentrate on achieving high production efficiency and wide distribution.
sentences.chinese: 故企業應致力於獲得高生產效率和廣泛的銷售覆蓋面。

sentences.english: All heaters provide a uniform coverage with a convenient, cleanable surface.
sentences.chinese: 所有加熱器的覆蓋面方便清洗。

sentences.english: In southern Europe the coverage is patchier.
sentences.chinese: 而在南歐，這些社會救助的覆蓋面是不完全的。

sentences.english: And comprehensive education is also essential to expanding the covered area of juvenile…
sentences.chinese: 以全方位的正面教育擴大防範青少年犯罪的覆蓋面。

sentences.english: Secondly, there are some holes in its coverage.
sentences.chinese: 第二，它的覆蓋面有一些漏洞。

sentences.english: Zhongyang folk paper-cut and large coverage of the county in both transmission.
sentences.chinese: 中陽民間剪紙覆蓋面大，在全縣境內均有傳承。

sentences.english: Elastic waist skirt with built-in short for comfort and coverage.
sentences.chinese: 內置的舒適性和覆蓋面的彈性高腰裙。

sentences.english: By contrast, Democrats focus on a major expansion of coverage for the uninsured .
sentences.chinese: 相反，民主黨則關注於未受保人保險覆蓋面的擴展。

sentences.english: These glaciers account for 47 per cent of the total glacier coverage in China.
sentences.chinese: 這些冰川佔中國總冰川覆蓋面積的47%。

definition: out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
